subject: Problem with pedals
description_text:
Hi. I have a problem with a break pedal in Simsonn black pro plus pedals. I was doing a race, everything was fine. After race i've wanted to restore my previous calibration settings in a Simpedalsconfig_v4 program. I've clicked "load calibration" and after that my brake pedal looks like unrecognisable. I can't calibrate it, nothing.
https://youtu.be/fL7X1i2eIf4

conversations.body_text: Hi Tomek Nagler,    Hello, the version you are currently using is too outdated. We recommend downloading and installing the latest SIMSONN Manager 2.1.0. Please follow the steps below to manually update the firmware:  Steps:    Open the software and go to Settings → Update → Manual Firmware Update    Select Pedals    Choose the plus.sfu file to perform the update    Once the update is completed, the issue should be resolved.     https://www.simsonn.com/pages/download
It worked. Thank you very much :)
